HeroSection.title: Welcome to Growth Business Development
HeroSection.subtitle: We understand that each project is a unique opportunity to transform and grow your business.

GrowthDeveloper.title: A Growth Business Developer
GrowthDeveloper.description: A Growth Business Developer is a professional specialized in identifying and creating growth opportunities for companies. Their role spans from strategic planning to implementing initiatives that drive business development.

ExpansionStrategies.title: Expansion Strategies in Mexico
ExpansionStrategies.description: Our services are designed to drive your business growth in the Mexican market, leveraging unique opportunities and overcoming specific challenges.

GrowthIntelligence.title: Growth Intelligence: Driving Growth
GrowthIntelligence.subtitle: Intelligent Automation for Your Business
GrowthIntelligence.description: Growth Intelligence is our intelligent automation solution designed to optimize processes, analyze data, and generate valuable insights to drive your business growth.

AliEstGrowth.title: AliEst-Growth
AliEstGrowth.description: AliEst-Growth is our group of companies specialized in creating and strengthening strategic alliances. We leverage unique synergies to drive mutual growth and generate long-term value for our partners.

benefits.network: Access to a diverse network of strategic partners
benefits.resources: Shared resources and economies of scale
benefits.innovation: Collaborative innovation and new market development

CTASection.title: Ready to boost your business?
CTASection.description: Discover how our growth strategies and alliances can take your company to the next level.
CTASection.cta: Schedule a meeting today and let's work on your next big project

AgenteBD.title: BD Agent
AgenteBD.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm the BD Agent, how can I help you today? I'm here to assist you with information about our services, schedule meetings, or answer any questions you may have.
